channel.title: Whirlwind Wheelchair
channel.description: A non-profit social enterprise dedicated to improving the lives of people with disabilities in the developing world while also promoting sustainable local economic development

item.title: Whirlwind 2011 Annual Newsletter
item.dc:creator: Israel Curtis
item.description: In this issues you’ll find stories about progress in the Dominican Republic, Georgia, and across the world. This has been one of our best years yet in our efforts to serve wheelchair riders. Thanks again to all our donors and partners for the critical roles you play. Please consider making a special holiday donation. Extra […]
item.content:encoded:
In this issues you’ll find stories about progress in the Dominican Republic, Georgia, and across the world. This has been one of our best years yet in our efforts to serve wheelchair riders.

Thanks again to all our donors and partners for the critical roles you play.  Please consider making a special holiday donation.  Extra funds are required in this period of rapid growth.  Thank you for doing what you can!

Download 2011 Newsletter here  .
